definitions.definition: A device in a transmission that disengages the driveshaft from the driven shaft when the driven shaft rotates faster than the driveshaft.
The mode or state of operation thus produced: Synonym of neutral .

main_definition: A device in a transmission that disengages the driveshaft from the driven shaft when the driven shaft rotates faster than the driveshaft.
secondary_definitions: The mode or state of operation thus produced: Synonym of neutral .
